TopicTitle: Preview of my jet engine with afterburner mode

Articles.Content: So this is a part I have been working on for the past couple of days. I have run into quite a few problems during the process so have not been able to get it done before I go on holiday tomorrow so development is on pause until 21/8. So keep an eye out for a release around that time (probably around 24-25/8)
Ooooo... very nice! Are you using a plugin or the stock RAPIER module to change the thrust and fuel use?

Ooooo... very nice! Are you using a plugin or the stock RAPIER module to change the thrust and fuel use?

Currently the stock module but I would like to write my own plugin for it so I have more control. For example one of the current problems is that when you turn on the afterburner mode, it turns off the other mode so when you turn off afterburner the engine has to start up again.

"Hmmph chough-cough" use AJE -cough cough

Not everyone wants to use AJE, unless you mean just use the plugin for a few of it's features and still keep it balanced to stock jet engines.
